headline: Does VICI Properties Offer Value After the Recent Stock Slip in 2025?
summary: If you’re wondering whether to stick with VICI Properties or add some shares to your portfolio, you’re not alone. In a market filled with shifting risks and fresh opportunities, VICI often attracts investor attention. Its stock price reflects this—over the past week, shares experienced a mild slip of -0.3%, while the 1-month dip sits at -5.3%. However, this does not erase a longer track record of resilience, including a 6.5% gain year-to-date and a significant 65.6% climb over the last five...
